about.title: About
about.description: About   I am a product-focused full stack engineer based in Bangalore, India, experienced in designing and delivering scalable MERN applications for real-world business systems. I've built reusable, config-driven React architectures that significantly reduced frontend code across multiple projects. Comfortable owning features end-to-end, collaborating with product and design teams at Frugal Scientific, and shipping production-ready systems used by active users.
